info.abstract: The Solution Paths component creates a visualization of the process students went through in order to solve a problem. The nodes in the graph are the steps that they got to throughout the problem. The links show how many students took a particular path and the color of the link corresponds to the correctness of their responses from one step to the next.
info.inputs: transaction - Must have columns for these variables: Student id, time, problem name, step name, outcome, selection. Names of these columns can vary and can be adjusted in the Advanced Options of the html file.
info.outputs:
Solution Paths html file
Original Input Data File - unmodified

options.b: Options are in the output html file
